texts.title: Tagline & Intro
texts.text: Trusted IT. Smarter AI. Lasting Impact. Resonira Technologies empowers businesses with future-ready digital solutions that echo innovation, precision, and impact. We specialize in scalable, secure, and innovative technology solutions that drive growth and transform industries.

texts.title: Team
texts.text: Team Profiles: Srilekha (CEO & Founder) – Visionary leader passionate about AI and business transformation. LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sri-lekha-resonira/ | Quaisar Jahan (COO) – Operations leader driving excellence and growth. LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/quaisar-jahan-b91866225/ | Agent Resonira (CTO) – AI agent leading technology strategy and innovation. | Sainath Pulluri (HR) – Builds and nurtures talent. LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sainath-pulluri-%E2%9C%85-71672948/ | Manoj (Product Manager) – Bridges business needs and technical solutions. LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tamlurkar-manoj-679527231/ | Prabanjan (AI Engineer) – ML specialist in deep learning and NLP. LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/prabanjan-banala-6b471a205/

texts.title: Company Stats
texts.text: Stats & Highlights: 25+ Projects Delivered; 20+ Happy Clients; 3+ Years Experience; 98% Client Satisfaction.

texts.title: Testimonials
texts.text: Testimonials: Sarah Chen (CEO, TechFlow Solutions): Resonira's AI-powered recommendation engine increased conversion rates by 40%. Michael Rodriguez (CTO, Blockchain Ventures): Robust and secure smart contract platform; launched ahead of schedule. Dr. Priya Sharma (Founder, MedTech Innovations): AI diagnostic system reduced analysis time by 60%.

texts.title: Process
texts.text: Delivery Process: 01 Discovery & Planning – requirements and detailed plan. 02 Design & Architecture – solution architecture and UX. 03 Development & Testing – agile build and QA. 04 Deployment & Support – launch and ongoing maintenance.

texts.title: Technologies
texts.text: Technologies: Frontend – React, TypeScript, Vue.js; Backend – Node.js; AI/ML – Python, TensorFlow; Cloud – AWS; DevOps – Docker, Kubernetes; Database – MongoDB, Redis; API – GraphQL.

texts.title: Mission & Vision
texts.text: Mission: To resonate innovation into every industry by building reliable, scalable, and futuristic technology solutions. Vision: To be a global leader in crafting technology that echoes excellence and empowers businesses worldwide.

texts.title: Values
texts.text: Innovation that Inspires; Integrity in Action; Collaboration that Resonates; Excellence in Delivery.

texts.title: Services
texts.text: We provide AI solutions, software development, and related technology services, including AI/ML systems and automation, custom web & mobile apps, cloud & infrastructure, and digital transformation consulting.

texts.title: Contact
texts.text: Email: info@resonira.com. Phone: +919154289324. Address: Hyderabad, India (Remote – Global Presence). Calendly: https://calendly.com/srilekha-resonira/30min
